note.p: Death: Gut Stintenberg am Schaalsee, Germany (21 June 1743)
Education: Schools at Turnau, Greitz and Coburg; Halle (admitted 1711)

Career: Tutor to two young counts of Siech Bunau, with whom he travelled in Germany and France (1713-1716); Tutor, Librarian and Steward to the von Bernstorff family; travelled with his pupils to Hanover, England (1718), Bohemia, Hungary, Italy, Switzerland and Lorraine (1729)
Authority: Birth date from Dr Uta Pezold
Notes: Index to Bulloch's Roll gives possible years of birth of 1688 and 1689. Proposed by Sir Hans Sloane
